extendedInfo.description: Take a beautiful journey into dreams!Meet drowsy Moonboy. Blown out of bed by a big lunar sneeze, he sleepwalks through dreams. Moonboy needs your help to reach his bed. Guide him safely through various traps, clear obstructions from his path, and shift his surroundings to create a safe passage to the cozy bed. Solve environment puzzles in a fantasy world, find multiple pathways through the game, and collect stars and crescents to experience the beauty of Sleepwalkerâs Journey fairytale atmosphere.You are Moonboyâs only guardian, and your imagination is the key that shapes the dream, as you lead the boy to his beloved bed. You are the dream creator. Sleepwalkerâs Journey highlights:- Now updated with a pack of 6 new levels!- Over 45 dreams to explore (and more coming with updates)- Environment puzzles where you shape the dream: move obstacles, use elevators, interact with objects and more to clear Moonboy's way- Visuals optimized for the most powerful Android Devices- Quality design from award-winning developer

reviews.title: How to QUIT??
reviews.comment: Maybe just me but when usually the return button is tapped on any phone; any app that\'s running shows the option to quit or not(in the title screen of the app), but in this one when I do that it just returns to the my phone\'s home screen and the RAM manager shows that the app has \"MINIMISED\" but not \"QUIT\". I mean where is the option to quit the game? If I get an answer I\'ll give a 5-star on this issue.
reviews.author: Ayan Datta

reviews.title: Good but not hard
reviews.comment: I thought I\'d be a braid-like game but it\'s a kids game... First levels are very easy. It also drains your battery, in need of performance enhancement.
reviews.author: Johan Hedstr\303\266m

reviews.title: Great intro...
reviews.comment: I have not been able to get passed the intro. It plays goes to a black screen and replays again. I\'d like to play or have my money back ( just saying)
reviews.author: Jessica Gomez

reviews.title: Utterly engrossing!
reviews.comment: The game in a nutshell is a gem. The artwork is gorgeous. The music is lovely and peaceful. Its a joy to immerse yourself in such a creative game like this. Runs incredibly smooth. Must own!
reviews.author: Andrea Ruiz

reviews.title: Beautiful game
reviews.comment: This game is a perfect example how mobile games should be. Graphics are detailed, sound is amazingly relaxing and gameplay is fun and simple. Must buy! Thank you devs for making this game and I hope you make more android games.
reviews.author: Michael John Esteban

reviews.title: I like it better than angry birds
reviews.comment: To pass the time very enjoyable, good job!
reviews.author: Shawn Turgeon

reviews.title: One-of-a-kind game. Stunning visually.
reviews.comment: Really nicely done I\'ve been playing video games for almost two decades across all platforms and this game really surprised me. I consider myself a tough individual...this game put a smile on my face and softened me up...still unsure of how a video game can have that affect on me.
reviews.author: Alex Fishman

reviews.title: Best game ever!
reviews.comment: This is the best game i played so far for Android! Its just brilliant! Puzzles on the right lvl of difficulty (its more about paying att than being super hard), graphics+song rly make me feel in a dreamworld! Such beautiful art! Super recommended game, a must have!
reviews.author: Nessa Stagg

reviews.title: Love this
reviews.comment: I love the plot story of the game, love the app icon, the relaxing sounds, the relaxing colors, everything! This is in my top favorite three apps. It\'s incredible, fun, and addicting. It makes me sleepy because of how peaceful it is! Edit: please make a summer app like this too, like with a beachy plot, theme, colors, and everything similar!
reviews.author: Anastayszha Douglas

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: It\'s an absolutely gorgeous game that reminds me a lot of Trine\'s graphic quality. It\'s definitely something that will force you to either pay full attention or never complete it. Worth every penny. You won\'t be disappointed with the cuteness or difficulty level. :)
reviews.author: Ashley M

reviews.title: Great and charming
reviews.comment: It\'s a great and charming game with a huge addiction factor. I found a bug though. If you collect to fast the stars, the game does nit count them well and even though you collected all the stars you might \"missed\" a few because of this. But in general I recommend to those who love arcade games!
reviews.author: Zsolt Benko

reviews.title: Game is beautiful but ads are a deal breaker.
reviews.comment: Gorgeous, albeit battery intensive game, but why are ads popping up in my task bar for your other bundles? Accidentally clicking one over wrote the two dozen tabs I had open in Chrome with the link to your ad, which never loaded before Chrome crashed. This is not okay, especially from a paid app.
reviews.author: Elyssa Gutbrod

reviews.title: Amazing game  but draaiinnss your battery
reviews.comment: The title says it all. Five star if they fix It :P
reviews.author: Matthew Ronholm

reviews.title: Great puzzle game
reviews.comment: Plays nice on my ASUS Transformer tf700. The graphics and sounds make for a very relaxing time!
reviews.author: Michael Crook

reviews.title: Some graphics are not showned..
reviews.comment: The game is great but it seems some images or textures are missing in my Samsung Galaxy Tab 3.
reviews.author: Christ Lan Paras

reviews.title: Notification spam
reviews.comment: This game recently started spamming in the notification bar and there is no way to turn this off. Uninstalling and avoiding this developer.
reviews.author: James Brady

reviews.title: Well done
reviews.comment: Fun game with great art work, worths one dollar in any case
reviews.author: failatunfailure

reviews.title: Super\303\263 mis expectativas
reviews.comment: Al inicio dud\303\251, pero ahora que lo he probado me doy cuenta de que vale la pena cada centavo, es una idea fenomenal la mezcla de la jugabilidad y la m\303\272sica, de los mejores juegos en la tienda.
reviews.author: Luis Daniel Moreno Camacho

reviews.title: Nice game
reviews.comment: My grand kid love this game now I play. Worth the money.
reviews.author: pamela fincham

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Awesome game
reviews.author: Cathy A
